name: ngsjs
description: a command line scripts library to facilitate the construction, distribution and executiton of reproducible next-generation sequencing (NGS) data analysis workflows including [snakemake](https://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/), [nextflow](https://www.nextflow.io/), [bpipe](https://github.com/ssadedin/bpipe) and [WDL](https://github.com/openwdl/wdl).
author: Jianfeng <lee_jianfeng@sjtu.edu.cn>
